div.a: An Update from the School Superintendent

a.title: Click to read more about: An Update from the School Superintendent

div.a: Read More about An Update from the School Superintendent

span.p: Cap and gown orders are in.Â We will have a drive-thru pickup on Thursday (April 16th) and Friday (April 17th) 11am-1pm, in front of the high school. You MUST remain in your cars and a staff member will bring your order to you.
If you are unable to attend, please send a email stating who will be picking up your order (prior to the pickup) to Mr Brenner: abrenner@tvschools.org. Hand writtenÂ notes will not be accepted.Â

br.span:
Parents/Guardians must submit anÂ application for each school aged child, each year.Â Applications are accessible by clicking on the link below.Â PleaseÂ complete the appropriate form by April 30th.Â You will be notified of your child's status, via regular mail,Â by July 15, 2020.
Intra District ApplicationÂ

div.a: Link to Sign Up for Muskingum County Library Card/Digital Downloads

span.p: What better way to spend some productive time at home than to read? Please click on the following link to open a library card and get access to thousands of digital books immediately from your own home.

span.p: At checkout, The Amazon Smile Foundation will donate 0.5% of the purchase price to Tri-Valley Baseball

div.a: Help Wanted - School Bus Drivers, Cooks, and Custodians

span.p: We are currently hiring substitute school bus drivers, cooks, and custodians.Â This is a great opportunityÂ for stay-at-home parents, retirees, and those looking for extra income.Â All costs for training and criminal background checks are covered by the school district.Â
Interested applicants must complete anÂ application which can be found by clicking the link below.Â Questions can be directed to Craig Strohacker, Director of Operations, at (740) 754-1442.
